pullrequest.title: remove use of numpy dtype workaround

content.raw: I had missed the addition of this workaround, and ran into a similar problem yesterday when testing the OpalKelly device. However, we were on numpy v1.11.3, which is newer than the minimum version you have specified…oh, wait, is it a typo and you meant that the bug is fixed in v1.15.1?
content.html: I had missed the addition of this workaround, and ran into a similar problem yesterday when testing the OpalKelly device. However, we were on numpy v1.11.3, which is newer than the minimum version you have specified…oh, wait, is it a typo and you meant that the bug is fixed in v1.15.1?
